heading: Sade Sati Analysis

general_explanation: Sade Sati is a 7.5-year astrological period associated with Saturnâ€™s transit over the natal Moon. It is divided into three phases and often teaches important life lessons. The impact varies based on your karma, placement of Saturn, and other planetary influences.
